entry.title: My sceneries from the plane window

link.title: My sceneries from the plane window

entry.content:
I was really struck by Maira’s “Sceneries From The Plane Window,” so I decided to shoot my own on my trip back from Portland. Her camera is better than mine, and the conditions in her plane were a bit better suited for photography, but I like the way some of these turned out.

[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10236-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10236/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10237-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10237/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10244-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10244/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10253-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10253/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10254-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10254/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10255-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10255/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10256-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10256/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10257-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10257/)
[![](https://parkerhiggins.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_10258-150x150.jpg)](https://parkerhiggins.net/2012/09/my-sceneries-from-the-plane-window/img_10258/)

The object in the front of the photograph is the propeller, and my arm (and bright green wrist-band) are a bit too visible in these. Most unfortunately, though, I had to put my camera away for the descent; it’s too bad, because we got an incredible aerial view of San Francisco.

We got that view flying into Oakland from the north, so if you are doing that, I can recommend a window seat on the right hand side.
entry.summary: I was really struck by Maira’s “Sceneries From The Plane Window,” so I decided to shoot my own on my trip back from Portland. Her camera is better than mine, and the conditions in her plane were a bit better suited for photography, but I like the way some of these turned out.
